pages.text: Ars Nouveau 1.23.0, Updated Turrets!$(li)Adds the Basic Spell Turret with significantly reduced crafting cost.$(li)Adds Enchanted Spell Turret, casts at a discount.$(li)Adds the Timer Spell Turret, casts on a timer.$(li)Adds the Bounce glyph$(li)Adds the Firework glyph$(li)Adds the Toss glyph
